ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Prashant Singh has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently he is employed as a Manager at COX Communication. Prashant has extensive knowledge of AIX UNIX, Linux, Linux Red Hat, Apache WEB Server, HACMP, VMware, Oracle 9i, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, IBM Hardware, Domain Name Server Protocol, SAN, Oracle, Network File System, IBM RS6000 Hardware, HP Hardware, Dynamic Host Control protocol, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Perl Programming, Jboss, Veritas Volume Manager, Veritas NetBackup, SMTP, Veritas Cluster, TCP/IP, Sun Solaris, POP, Microsoft Internet Information Server, IMAP, UNIX, RDBMS, RAID, Oracle Real Application Clusters, Oracle Applications, NIS, MySQL, IBM Hardware > IBM pSeries, HP-UX, Client/Server, Cisco Switches/Routers, shell scripting, Veritas File System, VCS, Ubuntu, Red Hat Cluster Servers, Oracle DBA, Oracle 11g, Oracle 10g Application Server, Oracle 10G, Nessus, Linux Debian, Korn Shell, Korn, Intel Assembler, IP, IBM WebSphere, Cluster Server, BIND. Prashant has some experience in managment (12 months).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Currently since 2013-08 the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Manager/Engineer at COX Communication.
